## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G50330](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G50330)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>HEC2</u>
- **Gene Name:** HECATE 2
- **Description:**   basic helix-loop-helix (bHLH) DNA-binding superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2074865
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [hec1,2,3]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The hec1,2,3 spt quadruple mutant had an enhanced phenotype compared to the hec1,2,3 triple or spt single. Carpels were completely unfused at the apical part, up to one third of the entire fruit indicative of a synergistic interaction.
